column1: I've been using this product along with the day cream and night cream for a couple of weeks. My skin is smoother, brighter, and has a nice glow. I'm happy with these products. I'm 62 years old, and my skin looks better!

I've been using this product for about 2 months now together with other L'oreal Facial products and I absolutely love this wipes. It removes all the dirt from my face and I have started seen my mustache area which I have a very dark spot looks a bit lighter. My face feels very clean and smooth. I use it every night.
I like this. Makes your face feel smooth and clean. Would recommend for dry skinned women. At least try it once!

I bought these Bright Reveal Brightening Daily Peel Pads over the weekend. With only one use so far, I've instantly seen results! My skin felt clean and smooth, with noticible improvement to my cystic acne! I couldn't believe it! My hormones are crazy right now and I guess the glycolic acid is really great treatment for them. Highly recommend!

I loved these L'Oreal Bright Reveal Brightening Daily Peel Pads. I can already see a huge difference in how my skin feels after I used five of the pads included. At first, it tingles and feels like it tightens pores. Then, it cools and feels like it adds radiance to skin. I recommend to anyone looking to improve their skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product has done a number of things for me. My skin feels smoother and more polished looking. My moisturizer absorbs better into my skin. My makeup looks better on this skin. I notice that I'm using less concealer on my acne spots. And finally, omg, my spontaneous weekly breakouts have STOPPED. yes, acne breakouts here and there have been on pause since I introduced this product to my nightly routine.

I noticed a difference after a week of use. My skin was brighter, dark spots had faded a bit, and areas were noticeable softer. It's not overly drying, and shouldn't cause redness unless your super sensitive. A full months use produced similar results as a real microdermabrasion treatment.

I had been using a much more expensive product. I found this online and decided to give it a try. Skin texture and evenness has improved, skin seems brighter and clearer. Great products for the cost. Only con that I've experienced is that my face seem very greasy after a few hours post use.

I received this in this last month since I been using it morning and night I have a very oily skin with this pads clean my face in morning and really feel clean breathing! In the night after clean my makeup and washing my face I use this pads again and take away all the residue my soap and makeup remover can't believe is really last long 1 pad for all my face neck :) [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
These pads are a quick and easy way to clean my face.

This is an amazing product. I've been using this for a couple years now, having noticed that my (mature 54 year-old) skin was looking dull and sallow. It definitely improved and lightened the appearance on my skin, even with having very sensitive skin. Very great product; highly recommend

I love to use these Bright Reveal Brightening Daily Peel Pads because they are very gentle on my face and my skin instantly has an amazing glow to it. I didn't like that my face was sticky after it dried. I would still buy them again though.

When I've purchased this product in the stores, the pads were dry & not very good. When I buy this from Jet, it is always very moist as well as less expensive. Will but again! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Unlike most users I actually paid for mine and read directions. After my cleansing routine I used the pad on my face and moisturized after. Skin feels smooth and looks brighter. I've always taken excellent care of my skin and this just fits well into my routine. I'll continue using these pads bc it's one step, no rinsing, or other products, so it's easier than similar products I've used before

I was set to see a dermatologist to have laser treatments on the sun spots on my face. Don't have to do this now, after two weeks of using Bright Reveal, the spots are fading. Comments have been made like "you look beautiful" since I've been using this product. I'm thrilled. Thank you.

My boyfriend bought this after reading some reviews on it and we both used it had wonderful results very quickly. I have worked in the highest end luxury destination spas around and 90% of the overpriced products we use could not even compared to this. I will definitely be buying the whole collection very soon. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is our container did not seal tightly and some of our pads dried out before we were even able to use them

I saw this on Dr. Oz so decided to give it a try and noticed immediate results. Was so thrilled after two nights I went back to store and bought more to share. When you find something this good you can't keep it to yourself! I have very sensitive skin so was expecting a possible reaction and to my most pleasant surprise, no reaction at all. My skin has not looked this good in years. I really can't say enough about how much I love the product after only 6 nights use and can't wait to see the results after 30.

I just recently purchased my second container of these pads and hope to continue to do so. I tried them for 30 days and have notice an improvement with my skin. My skin is brighter and my dark spots have faded a little. My skin will tingle and feel so clean and smooth. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have combination skin which is acne prone. I brought this RevitaLift brightening pads at a store and the worked well. I used it at night and the next morning my skin looked a lot smoother and was brighter. The glycolic acids seem to help keep the pores uncontested...so it will help people with acne and scars once the don't have extremely sensitive skin. It is a bit expensive for a drugstore brand.

I love L'Oreal products and am trying a new skin care regime. As I'm in my 30s, I'm beginning to get fine lines and my skin needs a new regime. I bought the whole skin care set for Revitalift and I'm so happy I did. These pads are great as even though I throughly washed my face I still notice some dirt coming off. They are perfect at night and I enjoy using them. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using these face pads for a week now; and, what a nice difference I am seeing! My face tone has improved and my skin glows! I am hoping with time that some of dark spots will lighten up. I also noticed some dirt on the pad, even though I had already cleansed my face thoroughly (or so I thought!). Nice product!

I bought this product with high expectations that it would help my hyperpigmentation. Much to my surprise when I got home to use them, the pads were bone dry and the plastic seal on them was kinda melted. I was upset that I spent that much money on something that is useless to me.

Ok... I've done some extreme things to my skin in the name of beauty only to discover this gem! These pads are awesome my skin looks new and refreshed! Thank you Loreal Paris for the free sample I'll be back for more! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Purchased these because I saw the special on Dr. Oz. I wasn't impressed. They left my skin oily with a film. They also dry out fast. They were expensive and I stuck with using them before bed (because they way they felt on my face) and only used 1/3 of the pads. The other dried out so they are wasted.

This is a great product to help lighten the skin. I was a bit concerned that the ingredients may make my skin feel a bit dried out or sensitive but that was not the case! These pads are quick and easy! LOVE THAT! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have only just started using this product after searching for one that was under $80 and I was thrilled to find this and give it a try. I have used it 3x (every other night to start) and I have already noticed results. My pours are smaller and my skin is smoother. I have also had no reactions to this, such as skin flares. I look forward to my results after using the entire tub.

I like these peel pads because they work for me, they are convenient and affordable! My skin is firmer and smoother, plumper and wrinkles are less pronounced on my face- and hands as after treating my face, I use the pads on the backs of my hands.
I am ok . Iam not with a december 2017 if you good time . [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I just bought this and read great reviews about it. So far my skin is so soft the first night. I'm hoping it will help with my textured skin and large pores and fine lines. I wish the pads would hold more product it seems it is not very saturated.
I was very excited when my order arrived coz i've read about good reviews on it. But when i open it, the pads are very dry. I tried using it anyway, and as expected, nothing happened to my skin.

I have been using these nightly after the brightening face wash for a month. I have large pores and sensitive/acne prone skin and love how this has evened out my skin tone and is helping clear out my pores.

After reading glowing reviews, I bought this product and was so looking forward to using it. Imagine my surprise when I opened the package and found 30 bone-dry pads. They was not a drop of product on them, no scent whatsoever emerging from them.

Ihave been using this product for three months and its made a difference. I am a gal who is over 65! I have always taken care of my skin and bonus I have no wrinkles. This product smoothed out the fine lines and boosted the radiance of my skin.
I seen this on Dr Oz about 1yrs ago been use it ever sense it has brightened my skin so much I use it every night befor bed just love it plus am a dark skin woman it works .

I have extremely sensitive skin so I chose to use this product only twice a week and I still saw great results. I had previous acne blemishes and this product dramatically reduced them and made my skin feel smoother. I would highly recommend this product.
I thought it would have more liquid inside. Pads were dry.
Love it, brightens my skin!

I purchased this, completely hoping it would work for me and sun spots, uneven complexion, I soo wanted this to work. Unfortunately, it did not work for me, was faithful and stayed true to the instructions! Ughhh, so wanted to see positive results.

I also turned 41 this year & can't believe the results from the last 3 weeks... Clear, smooth, bright, no pimples whatsoever... Amazing reduction of wrinkles. Very impressive. This product line is enough to restore anyone's faith in advertising. Nice work L'Oreal. Nice work indeed!
Excellent product
this is honestly the best product they came out with! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Purchased these pads because it has a similar formulation as the serum with spf 30 by the same company.
I love these things! Totally drastic results on my acne scars and dark spots! They stopped selling them in my store and I was so sad. Found em on walmart.com for cheaper and free shipping!!
I've been using this product for about a year. I have seen very noticeable changes in my age spots. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I live in a very dry climate. These pads help with my dry skin on my face and hands. I cut the pads in half so they last longer. They do tend to dry out. That's why I give this product 4 stars.

I purchased this product expecting to have some of my dark spots 'brightened." I didn't get the great results I was expecting. My skin did feel a little softer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
OMG! Made an immediate difference in the texture and smoothness of my face. I'm 62 years old and my skin looks much brighter- got rid of the dullness.

I bought the peel pads after using other bright reveal products that I loved. I am not sure if something is wrong with the pads but they are not scented at all, i feel nothing when i use them and they are not that soaked. Given they have gylcolic acid i feel like they should burn a little bit or be drying on my skin. I have been using for a week and see zero difference in skin tone, acne scars.

I have used the pads for a month. They have actually changed my skin. Its a amazing, smooth, bright and soft. If they weren't so expensive I would say I'd use them forever! I absolutely love this product, it's deff the most effective product I've ever used.
Used for2 months...Love love love fine lines deminished in a couple weeks
My face feels so, good after cleaning and then using these pads!
I brought this over a month ago use every night. It did slightly lighten s few blemish. Not worth the price I paid. Also have the moisturizer. It's ok
After I use the Daily Scrub I use these pads and it removes the extra make up. I would recommend this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I first tried L'Oréal revitalift scrub and day cream, and it works for my sensitive and always dull and tired look! So I went to try on this pads and it is just perfect for my skin! I use it every night and will continue using it as it gives my face a clear and smooth complexion!

I don't know that these have a rejuvenating effect, but I like that I feel like my face is really clean after using each pad. I have verrrry sensitive skin and these cause no break outs (in fact, may be helping). My face looks fresh and healthy, and it's softer than it's been in years. (I'm 41 and have been using these daily for about 6 months). So I'll continue using them. Wish they were less pricy but maybe it's worth it.

The Revitalift Brightening Pads were the only product that I didn't love. They irritated my sensitive skin and burned my face. I couldn't use them. They smelled good and probably work fine for other people but were too strong for me. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I started by following the product instructions, but found fast that the peel pads worked better for me on a twice a week basis. I did like them for the days I wore a heavier makeup, per it was an extra deep clean. Good news I will save money, by not needing them everyday day, but they worked very well with all the other products. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Used this product with the Revitalift Bright Moisturizer with SPF 30 and Cleanser. All products complement each other and make my skin more young looking by reducing wrinkles and skin tone unevenness. This helps make me see results faster by removing some dead skin on the surface to allow the new skin come through and shine! Highly recommend this product along with all of the Loreal Revitalift Bright Review line. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I tried the peel pads and really liked the results. They are easy to use. You open and wipe your face - can't get any easier. I noticed that my skin looked fresher. some of the dull, dry patches were gone. One of the down sides of this product is, it also exfoliates your fingertips, so the ones that touched the pad were a little dry. Overall I would totally use this product and tell anyone looking to even their skin tone to try this too! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I haven't seen any major difference in the ten days I've been using this regime, but one thing I do really like about the peel pads is that they are gentle on my skin and don't leave it feeling dry afterwards. I think though that visible results will be seen with continual use of these pads. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved d effect the product had but wasn't pleased with the corrosive feeling during use . Used it less than the remaining product in d revitalift collection .all in all it works but be ready for mild irritation on skin [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think this was my favorite product out of the whole Revitalift line. You could almost feel all the dirt and grime screaming as it was scrubbed away. Not a painful brillo pad scrubbing away kinda feeling! It is very good at getting all the makeup that the makeup remover wipes missed. Honestly, My face felt so clean and super smooth after using these little magical pads. This is at the very top of my list for Santa this year!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Having sensitive skin, I loved that the peel pads were gentle on my skin. I didn't have any irritation from using these and the best part was that I noticed my skin tone has been more even, my skin is brighter (I've worn less make up since using these products!) and soft! I am a huge fan of this line and will continue to use all 4 products [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

These pads are gentle and effective. My skin is sensitive and combination. These worked effectively on all areas of my face. I've noticed an overall increase in the brightness of my skin. This is the first time I've used glycolic acid based cleansing system and I'm impressed. I'm certainly going to keep using these. I've achieved results using these once a day and not twice. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I will admit that I was a little hesitant to use the L'Oreal brightening Peel Pads. I always worry that these type of products will be harsh on my facial skin. I was pleasantly surprised when I used these. I used the peel pads after cleansing my skin in the evening with the L'Oreal daily scrub. These pads are not to harsh and they made my skin feel so refreshed and really evened out my skin tone. I loved how my skin looked refreshed! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was very excited to try the Loreal Revitalift Brighting product line. As soon as I got it I couldn't wait to start my trial. The pads felt good and felt realy good on my skin as well as left it feeling silky smooth. I only gave the product a low rating due to the fact that it caused me to have a bad allergic reation. For some one else the product I'm sure would be very pleasing. Remember please I only gave the product such a low rating due to my reaction. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

These revitalift bright reveal brightening peel pads have worked wonders. My face always seemed so dull... after using this product I can definitely see that my face isn't so dull anymore. Thanks again @bzzagent and @loreal for letting me try for free [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was quite unimpressed with the Brightening Peel Pads and only used them for about 5 days. They left my face with an odd film that I just couldn't get past. Definitely not dry, but not oily. It was almost like a pre-moisturizer feeling, if that makes any sense. Unfortunately, not a fan. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I cannot gush enough about the L'Oreal Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Peel Pads.!!! I have sensitive skin and this product works so well! I am receiving TONS of compliments on how youthful my skin looks! I have never used a Peel pad but I am now a customer for life! Everyone says I just radiate! They are so easy to use and I feel my skin softening right away from these pads. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am very pleased with the results of the Revitalift Bright Real Brightening Peel Pads. My skin is brighter and softer after using this collection. I will be buying this collection in the near future. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am not a fan of the name for this product. It is a bit deceiving, as this is not really a "peel pad". For me this was more along the lines as "stridex" pads. It seemed to be more of a toner, not a peel. I used this for about 2 weeks at night, while my skin was generally cleaner after using these (you can see the dirt on the pad), I felt my skin was drier for using it. For the brightening aspect, I did notice a bit of an improvement. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Out of all 4 products I received from bzzagent I must say that this one is definitely by far my favorite. I love they that are so quick and easy to use not to mention gentle enough to use every day. I will definitely continue to use this product. I'm not really sure that it has done much for the fine lines and such but I have noticed that over time my skin does look brighter and more refreshed. Would recommend them to anyone looking for a fast easy daily face cleanser. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The L'Oreal Brightening Peel Pads were just ok for me. I have very sensitive skin and they seemed to irritate and sting a little. They also had a strong smell. Keep in mind neither was so bad that I discontinued use for my 30 day challenge. On the other hand, they did do a great job in removing leftover dirt. Even after washing my face, these L'Oréal Peel Pads would still find and lift leftover dirt. No dirt or oil stands a chance with these pads! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

After scrubbing my face, I generally think I have removed all of my makeup from the day. These pads prove me wrong. They get all the spots I missed during my routine wash. It's especially good for areas on the neck and corners of the nose. For some reason there's always trace amounts of makeup left behind in those areas. The pads leave my skin feeling refreshed and clean as a whistle. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think L'Oréal New Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Peel pads are really good ,I thought they would be harsh on my skin ,but they were not after using them for two weeks I noticed that my skin like smoother and less dull and glowing they do tingle , i notice that when rub tonhard it left white pieces of the pad on my skin ,so Ihad use lightly and not press so hard ,I do recommend these and I never broke out while using them. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using L'Oréal Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Peel Pads for a month now. I use them every night after I cleanse my face. I have rosacea and they didn't irritate my skin like I was afraid they would. My skin looked brighter after just a few uses. I will continue to use them. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I recently tried the new Loreal Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Peel Pads. They are a great compliment to the other items in the Bright Reveal series. I only wish that the pads had a bit more wetness to them. They seem to dry out after only half of my face is cleaned. Otherwise, they leave my skin feeling clean and smooth. After two weeks of use I can definitely see brighter skin revealed! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Again, I have real dry skin that flakes and sometimes i get little pimples as well. These pads are great at helping to slough off the dry skin and help minimize the pimples. 1 pad works great for your whole face and I use them every night. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely loved these pads. After using them nightly for a about 10 days I noticed my skin visibly less dark spots. As well I've noticed less breakout but to be fair, my skin is not very prone to acne. This is an amazing addition to my night skincare regimen!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

These pads do a pretty good job with cleaning my skin. They're larger than I needed so I cut them in half to get more uses. I'm not sure if they are really doing anything other than cleaning , but they're good enough at that. The pads feel durable and nice. The scent is light; not unbearable. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think these pads were great in that they were not at all harsh or drying but I wish I had seen some improvement in the overeall shine/fine lines in my skin as I was expecting. I used them nightly after using the scrub and just before the moisturizer/serum mixture. Overall, the pads seem to add that extra cleansing step, I am just not sure that I notice a difference overall. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is such a wonderful product! Ive used the more expensive brands and in my opinion, L'Oreal Revitalift Bright Reveal Peel Pads work just as well at a fraction of the cost. My skin definitely looks brighter, and my pores look smaller. Will definitely be using again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love these products! I can truly see a great difference in my skin tone and complexion. I used the whole set for day and night on my face, neck, and cleavage area. It is awesome! I wish I could afford to by the products, but they are kind of pricey. Maybe I can get one at a time. Not sure if I'll get the same results, but I'll try. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Unfortunately the beginning of using this I was experiencing an amazing glow etc. But now my skin is drying. So I stopped using it a couple of days ago. Expected better results for myself. Not telling you not to use it. Because im sure its a great product, it was for me at the beginning. Now not so much unfortunately. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Peel Pads are a good product. There not my favorite out of the Revitalift collection but they work good at keeping my skin looking more youthful and radiant. I had no problem with them stinging or drying out my skin like similar products have caused. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Loved the brightening peel pads!! Instantly left my skin feeling cleaner, clearer and bright! They're not scented which I loved , they're super durable and they work! loreal does it again. I'll add this to my sky nacre routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using these revitalift bright reveal pads for about 3 weeks. I received them in a free kit from bzzagent for an honest review. I like them, they come in a container that has a screw on lid, so they stay moist, unlike some that come in a plastic bag that sometimes doesn't shut good and dries out. They make my skin feel clean and refreshed. Doesn't really brighten that I can tell but my skin doesn't need that much. Highly recommended! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

First of all i enjoyed being able to try the product. The Reviaitalift Brighting Peel Pads smelled wonderfull and were a joy to use. They glided over my skin and felt like silk. The reason i had to give the product is it caused me to have an allergic reaction. To others it may work wonders. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Revitalift bright reveal peel pads felt great, super refreshing -- I used them after the exfoliating cleanser- and found they gave me a super clean feeling and even brighter skin. They add the perfect touch at the perfect time. Face felt light and airy... left no residue. Leaves your face primed and ready for day or night moisturizer!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The reveal pad have played a big part in this collection. They make my face feel refresh and even out my skin tone. I love how they make me feel everytime I use them. Make my skin feel S oft I love them really love them. I notice my skin looks more even. age and brown spots are disappearing and my skin looks more brighter and glowy. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Peel pads really did do much for me, it may take longer for people with darker pigments. For this part of the challenge, this should have probably been longer depending on your pigmentation. I would have given about 60 days to notice a difference in using it, to give an honest review. I see where there going with this, but again it depends on the pigmentation of a person. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like the concept of the peel pads. They are intended to gently scrub and cleanse the face after washing. But I have to say that these pads really burn when used and I am not a huge fan. I wish they were a little less harsh but effective at cleaning and scrubbing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Absolutely loving these peel pads, my skin is left smoother and brighter, when combined with the other products you will never change skin care regiments. Your skin will feel and look years younger, my skins softness now feels baby soft, it looks brighter and more even and fine lines around my eyes are deminished. LOVE LOVE LOVE this product [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used the peel pads after cleaning my face with the daily scrub cleaner. The smell was nice -- a light citrus. I noticed several times during my use of these products that the pads left my skin burning a little bit. It didn't last long and wasn't painful, more annoying. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The cleansing pad is an essential part of the routine care in the Revitalift kit. As soon as you use the pads you start to see the results. The skin looks firmer and reduce the appearance of wrinkles.The skin feel refresh and it help me absorb the moisturizers better. I love the product and I recommend it also. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think the Peel Pads worked wonderfully when I used them. They polished my skin nicely and were easy to use. I really did like how my skin felt each time I used the pads. However, I had difficulty remembering to use this product - it wasn't very conveninet for me. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like the way the Peel pads gently exfoliate my face and neck without feeling too harsh and I did like how smooth my face and neck felt after using them. They also have a fresh gentle scent. I used daily for the first week and then only used them every 3 days. The only thing bad about the pads in my opinion was the pads leave a sticky film on your face that does not go away without re-cleaning your face again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Nice product that didn't irritate my sensitive skin. I used it at night after cleansing my skin and before applying the dual overnight moisturizer. I have been using these once or twice a week and do not use daily as I wanted to take it slow since my skin is prone to redness and irritation. I wouldn't say that I've noticed any brightening with my skin but this is a simple extra step that I add in my night time skincare routines that I hope over time will show results. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think that these peel pads are amazing. Not only do they get rid of any residue, they smooth and lift the wrinkles away. My skin has never felt better or looked better after using the whole system. I will continue to use this system. It has dulled my age spots and has smoothed my wrinkles and it makes my skin shiny and smooth. I'm running out to get more of this system! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was pretty impressed with these pads. The seemed to help some of my spots on mycfacealong with some other products in the collection. Even though I have oily skin these pads ( which the ingredients are designed for normal to dry skin) I did not break out. I would consider purchasing these in the future. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

These peeling pads were awesome. I noticed that small spots and scars seemed to fade away after use. It could be the fact that I used the entire line, but I felt the daily pads contributed greatly to the improvement that I saw. After using I felt a small tingle which I felt was proof the product was working. I'll probably continue to use the products I liked best to see if this is true. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

With sensitive skin I have always been very careful about the products I use on my face. The peel pads I am in love with. All you do is wash your face with the scrub at night and then follow with the peel pads. They take away dead skin, and leave it feeling refreshed. They have a light clean smell, and your face will be brighter in the morning . I love the peel pads because they make my skin soft , and they don't irritate it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The peel pads were great however I used them every other day, and sometimes every 2 days. I noticed using them everyday left my skin a little more sensitive than usual. I'll still recommend them but would not advise daily usage. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the L'Oréal Peel Pads, my skin feels softer and brighter and my pores are smaller. I did receive the whole collection but sometimes I only used the peel pads depending on the day. I would buy them after this campaign, they are that good. They are quick and easy to use, the pads have enough liquid on them to use them on my whole face, neck and the back of your hands. The pads did leave my face feeling warm after, I took that as a result of it working. Great product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I haven't used a peel pad for my face in years...the L'Oréal Revitalist pads are amazing! The pads are soft and not too harsh on my skin... I feel like they do exfoliate and brighten my skin.! I would buy them and use them again! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Of all the Revitalift Brightening products L'Oreal made I was most excited to use the Brightening Peel pads. After washing my face with the scrub I applied the pads over my entire face in a circular motion like the instructions recommended. Using them every night until I ran out I thought a difference would surely be seen. There was just nothing to see. It was almost like an unnecessary step that you wouldn't miss if you excluded it in your facial care routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
